name: The Train Jam Game Jam Game
name_original: The Train Jam Game Jam Game
description:
In this resource management simulator of a cross-country game jam, you learn a little bit about how to manage your time effectively, and a lot about the world around you..

Design, Code, Writing, and Producer: Belinda Zoller (@theberlz)
Code, Time Wasting: IO (@JoannaBlackhart)
